Package pente

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIPlayer
    AIPlayer represents an Artificial Intelligence player and is meant to be subclassed by classes that implement the makeMove method which determines where an AIPlayer will make its next move.
    Board
    A Board is a 2D grid of Objects.
    GameResult
    A GameResult stores the win/loss totals of an individual player.
    GridObject
    A GridObject is a generalization of any object meant to be displayed as a BufferedImage in any kind of grid or 2D array.
    GridView
    A GridView is a custom JPanel that is displayed as a regular grid of columns and rows, each of which may contain a GridObject.
    HighlightPanel
    This class handles drawing the overlays on top of the Pente board when the mouse is pressed (for Human Players) and when winning pieces or captured pieces are highlighted.
    Location
    This class represents a Location in a grid in terms of a (row, col) pair.
    PenteController
    This class serves as the main controller for Pente games.
    PenteGUI
    Creates a new JFrame that contains all the GUI elements for Pente.
    PenteLogic
    This class contains helper methods to aid in the coding of Pente logic and in the tracking of winning pieces and captured pieces.
    PenteMain
    Entry point for running a Pente game
    PentePanel
    A PentePanel is a JPanel that contains a GridView where pieces will be placed on grid line intersections rather than within grid lines.
    Player
    This class represents a human Player on the Pente board.
    ScrollPanel
    This class is used as a message area and is displayed on a parchment scroll in the Pente game.
